service.name: Premium In-Home Consultation
service.description: A comprehensive 60-minute visit with a board-certified physician in the comfort of your home, including diagnosis, treatment plan, and prescriptions if needed.
expectations: Vital signs check (blood pressure, temperature, etc.)

preparation_guide.title: Medical Information
preparation_guide.description: List of current medications, allergies, and medical history

preparation_guide.title: Comfortable Clothing
preparation_guide.description: Wear loose clothing that allows access to arms for blood pressure

preparation_guide.title: Fasting
preparation_guide.description: Fast for 8-12 hours if blood work might be needed

preparation_guide.title: Space Preparation
preparation_guide.description: Have a clean, quiet space available for the examination

options.label: Pay at Visit
options.description: Cash, credit, or debit when doctor arrives
